channel.title: Move npc?
channel.description: hey i got a server but i wana add my shops npc to a house and i need to remove some items on the edge shop anyone knows how its done?

item.title: Move npc?
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Make sure you type ::dataon because you need the coordinates, or you can add a ::mypos command with this:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase("mypos")) { c.sendMessage("X: "+c.absX+" Y: "+c.absY+" H: "+c.heightLevel); }

Read full topic

item.title: Move npc?
item.dc:creator: @BigAbdul BigAbdul
item.description:
@BigAbdul wrote:

for pi go to data/cfg/spawn-config.cfg and search your npc id code and change the c and y coords

for delta its in data/autospawn.cfg i believe (last used delta in 2009) same concept

shops.cfg find the name of the shop and change the item and the amt. or remove it if you wish

Read full topic

item.title: Move npc?
item.dc:creator: @macca4g macca4g
item.description:
@macca4g wrote:

shops.CFG — Edit this for your shops

NPC.CFG — will add your NPC

Autospawn.CFG — will move your npc to where you want

Read full topic
